docs.snippet: Scotland could suspend its drive to become independent if Britain avoids a "hard Brexit" in which it loses access to the European Union's single market, the head of its secessionist government said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Scotland could suspend its drive to become independent if Britain avoids a "hard Brexit" in which it loses access to the European Union's single market, the head of its secessionist government said on Friday.

headline.main: Scotland Says Could Put Secession on Hold if UK Avoids 'Hard Brexit'
headline.print_headline: Scotland Says Could Put Secession on Hold if UK Avoids 'Hard Brexit'

docs.snippet: Germany may make payments to Namibia for the killing of 65,000 tribespeople during colonial occupation, an episode that is seen by some as the first genocide of the 20th century, a Foreign Ministry spokesman said Friday....
